subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds hit his 740th home run yesterday, connecting for the second consecutive game and helping Matt Cain earn his first victory of the season in the San Francisco Giants’ 2-1 victory against the visiting Arizona Diamondbacks.
snippet: Barry Bonds hit his 740th home run yesterday, connecting for the second consecutive game and helping Matt Cain earn his first victory of the season in the San Francisco Giants’ 2-1 victory against the visiting Arizona Diamondbacks.
